data.text: @pinkiepoopoo Perhaps advertising standards would like to see the entire email then? 😄

@cleotibbitts Such a super legit line of work 😆
https://t.co/XTxfPT405N

@Theresoucefult1 It’s SO much easier for them to think that they’re helpless against radiation weapons, than to think they might be suffering from a virus which they *could* have had vaccine protection from. 

It’s a beautiful example of cognitive dissonance.
@Lidbud Indeed. They got a very direct response from me. I won’t ever support their business again.
@cleotibbitts Wow. Way to destroy your own brand.
@cleotibbitts These are the scum that need to be arrested!
@girliescholar I’m glad it’s not just me who cringes at that! 😄😄😄
